Package com.cipherlibrary

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Encryptable
    Interface providing methods controlling all of the Encryptor classes.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AffineEncryptor
    Represents a machine, which can encrypt or decrypt text, using affine cipher (each letter is enciphered with the function (ax + b) mod 26)
    AtBashEncryptor
    Represents a machine, which can encrypt or decrypt text, using AtBash cipher (inversion of the alphabet (A to Z, B to Y etc.)
    CaesarEncryptor
    Represents a machine, which can encrypt or decrypt text, adding 3 to a position of a letter in an alphabet (starting from 1)
    Encryptor
    Base Class of all Encryptor classes, implements Encryptable Interface.
    RailFenceEncryptor
    Represents a machine, which can encrypt or decrypt text, using rail fence cipher (the text is written downwards and diagonally on successive "rails" of an imaginary fence).
    Rot13Encryptor
    Represents a machine, which can encrypt or decrypt text, adding 13 to a position of a letter in an alphabet (starting from 1)
    Rot47Encryptor
    Represents a machine, which can encrypt or decrypt text, adding 47 to a position of a letter in an alphabet (starting from 1)
    VigenereEncrytpor
    Class representing a machine capable of encrypting and decrypting input text using provided key and Vigenere Cipher.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CipherMode
    Enum representing all modes in which encryption and decrpytion can take place.
